title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.7 - Failure to select a winner and race cancellations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.7 - Failure to select a winner and race cancellations

State Regulations
(a) If no daily double ticket is sold
designating the winner of the first race, or the first race is cancelled or
declared "no race", the daily double shall be declared off and the gross pool
refunded. (b) If no daily double
ticket is sold combining the winners of the first and second races, or the
second race is cancelled or declared "no race", the net pool shall be
distributed to holders of tickets designating the winner of the first race, as
in a win pool and the daily double shall terminate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4217.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
